snippet: To the Editor:    An Oct. 8 editorial on California's Proposition 10 does not mention that a similar effort is under way in New York.     The Kids' Health Initiative, sponsored by groups like the American Cancer Society, American Heart Association...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: An Oct. 8 editorial on California's Proposition 10 does not mention that a similar effort is under way in New York. The Kids' Health Initiative, sponsored by groups like the American Cancer Society, American Heart Association, American Lung Association and Medical Society of the State of New York, seeks to raise the price of cigarettes $1 a pack.
abstract: Ken Ferguson letter says it seems hypocritical that California's anti-smoking initiative should be spearheaded by film director Rob Reiner since Hollywood movies promote smoking (Oct 8 editorial)

headline.main: Cigarette Tax Only Sounds Like a Good Idea; New York's Effort
